import json
from pyspark.sql.functions import *
from datetime import datetime, date

sqlQuery = "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS silver LOCATION 'abfss://adlsfslacedccc@adlslacedccc.dfs.core.windows.net/silver'"
print(sqlQuery)
spark.sql(sqlQuery)

# Get today's date
today = datetime.now()

# Extract year, month, and day with leading zeros for month and day
year_value = today.strftime("%Y")
month_value = today.strftime("%m")
day_value = today.strftime("%d")

print(year_value, month_value, day_value)

df = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM etlcontrol.IngestionList where IsActive = true")

rows = df.collect()

for row in rows:
    if row.IsIncrementalLoad == 0:
        print(row.SourceName, row.SourceSchemaName, row.SourceTableName)
        raw_file_name = f"abfss://adlsfslacedccc@adlslacedccc.dfs.core.windows.net/bronze/{row.SourceName}/{row.SourceSchemaName}/{row.SourceTableName}/{year_value}/{month_value}/{day_value}/*.parquet"
        silver_file = f"abfss://adlsfslacedccc@adlslacedccc.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/{row.SourceName}_{row.SourceSchemaName}_{row.SourceTableName}/"

        df = spark.read.parquet(raw_file_name)
        df = df.withColumn('LoadDateTime', expr("CURRENT_TIMESTAMP"))
        df = df.withColumn('SourceSystem', lit('LACE_Demo'))
        df.write.option('path', silver_file).mode('overwrite').format('delta').saveAsTable(f"silver.{row.SourceName}_{row.SourceSchemaName}_{row.SourceTableName}")
    else:
        print("incremental load")
